description:
Adapted to a range of pursuits from bouldering to hikes and scrambles, this midweight stretch fleece crew is an essential midlayer for any mountain goer. Built with warm, high-wicking, 96% recycled Thermic™ G fleece, it has a soft next-to-skin feel and responds when the intensity climbs by quickly expelling moisture. The fabric offers 4-way stretch for unhindered mobility when you’re making each reach.

The crew’s details have been designed with your comfort and freedom of movement in mind, such as double layer rolled cuffs, and articulated sleeves with great arm lift. The dropped rear hem keeps your hips warm and fits seamlessly under a harness.

With a technical yet understated style, crew neck design, and comfortable fit, the Graviton Crew is as at home when you’re kicking back as it is at the crag or on the trail.
name: Rab Graviton Crew - Mens
